content: What major river flows through ten countries and four capital cities before emptying into the Black Sea?

The major river that flows through ten countries and four capital cities before emptying into the Black Sea is the Danube River. The countries it passes through are Germany, Austria, Slovakia, Hungary, Croatia, Serbia, Bulgaria, Romania, Moldova, and Ukraine. The four capital cities it flows through are Vienna (Austria), Bratislava (Slovakia), Budapest (Hungary), and Belgrade (Serbia).
